migration-v16-remove-module-id.description: As of Angular v16, the `moduleId` property of `@Component` is deprecated as it no longer has any effect.

migration-v16-guard-and-resolve-interfac.description: In Angular version 15.2, the guard and resolver interfaces (CanActivate, Resolve, etc) were deprecated. This migration removes imports and 'implements' clauses that contain them.
